text:
Eraldo Isidori (17 June 1940 – 16 December 2018) was an Italian politician. He was born in Macerata, Italy. Isidori was a member of the Italian Chamber of Deputies from 2010 to 2012. Isidori was a member of the Lega Nord.
Isidori died on 16 December 2018 in Bologna, Italy from complications of surgery, aged 78.
